metadata.synopsis: Karlach tells players that she is about to die if they didn't learn about that till this point in the story. She should be a bit run-down during this convo, a little strained by the engine.

7.speaker: Karlach
7.text: You saw Gortash, didn't you? What the fuck was he doing down there? Is all of this because of him?
7.context: NodeContext: Furious, straining from the heat

13.speaker: Karlach
13.context: NodeContext: Furious, straining from the heat

45.speaker: Player
45.text: I don't know how this plot fits together yet. But we will stop him.
45.context: NodeContext: Furious, straining from the heat

50.speaker: Karlach
50.text: I was his bodyguard. I looked after him with my life. I trusted him more than anything.
50.context: NodeContext: Furious, straining from the heat

48.speaker: Karlach
48.text: He gave me away to Zariel just for kicks. He ruined my life just when it was starting.
48.context: NodeContext: Furious, straining from the heat

25.speaker: Karlach
25.text: And now he'd use up the entire Sword Coast.
25.context: NodeContext: Furious, straining from the heat

41.text: He has to die. And I'm gonna be the one who kills him.
41.context: NodeContext: Furious, straining from the heat

4.speaker: Karlach
4.text: He has to die. And I'm gonna be the one who kills him.
4.context: NodeContext: Furious, straining from the heat

1.speaker: Player
1.text: We'll do it together. Whatever it takes.

30.speaker: Karlach
30.text: He can't get away with what he's done. To me, to us. He won't get away with it!

17.speaker: Karlach
17.text: I can feel it. The engine. It's getting hotter. Louder. It's going to blow, if we don't find another way to fix it.
17.context: NodeContext: It's ambiguous here whether she's talking about killing Gortash or getting her engine fixed.

49.speaker: Karlach
49.text: I can feel it. The engine. It's getting hotter. Louder. It's going to blow, if we don't find another way to fix it.
49.context: NodeContext: It's ambiguous here whether she's talking about killing Gortash or getting her engine fixed.

16.speaker: Karlach
16.text: I can feel it. The engine. It's getting hotter. Louder. I feel like... like it might burn out completely. And soon, if I don't find some way to fix it.
16.context: NodeContext: It's ambiguous here whether she's talking about killing Gortash or getting her engine fixed.

52.speaker: Karlach
52.text: You know, Zariel may have put the fucking thing in, but Gortash gave her the go-ahead. You expect this shit from devils. But not from the people you care about.
52.context: NodeContext: It's ambiguous here whether she's talking about killing Gortash or getting her engine fixed.

35.speaker: Karlach
35.text: Let's get to the city. Got business there I'm highly fucking keen to attend to.
35.context: NodeContext: It's ambiguous here whether she's talking about killing Gortash or getting her engine fixed.

38.speaker: Karlach
38.text: Do you know this engine inside of me is going to blow? If I don't find an infernal mechanic, I'm finished.

36.speaker: Karlach
36.text: Do you know what's inside me? An infernal engine. It burns as hot as the Hells, and it's been running in overdrive since I left Avernus.

44.speaker: Karlach
44.text: Zariel may have put the fucking thing in, but Gortash gave her the go-ahead. You expect this shit from devils. But not from the people you care about.

40.speaker: Karlach
40.text: I need to get myself fixed in time to make him pay.

43.speaker: Karlach
43.text: How can we fix your engine?

22.speaker: Player
22.text: How can we fix your engine?

28.speaker: Karlach
28.text: An infernal mechanic could do it - and quickly. I'm hanging on, but just by my fingertips.

34.speaker: Player
34.text: I might know someone - a tiefling weaponsmith we met in the druids' grove.

46.speaker: Karlach
46.text: If he went on to Baldur's Gate, we might be able to find him. He owes you a favour after what you did, right?

11.speaker: Player
11.text: There must be someone we can consult in Baldur's Gate.

19.speaker: Karlach
19.text: I'm not going out yet - got business with a motherfucker first.

8.speaker: Player
8.text: We can keep our eyes peeled, but I'm more concerned about the giant illithid brain that just left for the city.

20.speaker: Karlach
20.text: I want to live to fight it. Not burn out before I get the chance.

12.speaker: Karlach
12.text: I've got a long list of evil fucks to deal with. And I'm not going out until I do.

9.speaker: Karlach
9.text: Then I need to find an infernal mechanic - and quickly. I'm hanging on, but just by my fingertips.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: If you're going to explode, I suggest you stay far away from me.

29.speaker: Karlach
29.text: I'm more likely to implode than blow up, more's the pity. Wouldn't mind taking out a few cultists on my way out the door. But better if it doesn't come to that.

21.speaker: Karlach
21.text: I need to find an infernal mechanic - quickly. I'm hanging on, but just by my fingertips.

42.speaker: Karlach
42.text: You bet your arse I am. And I won't stop 'til that fucker is dead!

5.speaker: Player
5.text: Not if I kill him first.

18.speaker: Karlach
18.text: I won't know peace 'til I've dug my thumbs into his eyes. 'Til I've ripped his throat out with my teeth. Hear that, Gortash?! I'm coming for you!

51.speaker: Player
51.text: It seems he's a servant of Bane, as Ketheric served Myrkul. Who knows what powers he's gained since you knew him?

3.speaker: Karlach
3.text: I'd never have protected a Banite, even a decade ago. I looked after that fucker with my life. I trusted him.

6.speaker: Karlach
6.text: He gave me away to Zariel without a second thought, and now he's looking to ruin the entire Sword Coast.

33.speaker: Player
33.text: We'll find out when we get to Baldur's Gate.

14.speaker: Karlach
14.text: Whatever the fuck he's been up to in the last ten years, we have to stop him. He can't just keep ruining people's lives. He can't get away with it!

32.speaker: Karlach
32.text: He used me up and gave me away when he was done with me. Didn't matter how much I trusted him.

10.speaker: Karlach
10.text: I heard about what happened. Ketheric. Myrkul. And Gortash. What the fuck was he doing down there? Is all of this because of him?
